title: Join GTA+
headline: Join GTA+
subtitle: Get 4X GTA$ & RP on Bail Office Standard and Most Wanted Targets
content:
Join Grand Theft Auto Online’s premium Membership program this month and you’ll receive 4X rewards on Bail Office Standard and Most Wanted Targets.

You can also get 50% off Bail Office Properties, 50% off Bail Office Upgrades and Modifications, a Free Stun Gun in the Gun Van, and 4X rewards on Dispatch Work and Wildlife Photography.

GTA+ automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
